name: Software Development
description:
A collection of short online courses covering:
- Software Development Lifecycle course
- Object Orientated Design course
- UML course
- Java course
- Design Patterns with Python course
- Software Architecture course
- Solid Principles course
- Pair Programming course
- APIs and WebServices course
- DevOps course

To prove completion of these online courses, the student must provide a copy of the course completion certificates provided by the course provider. We also have access to the Course Provider system and can verifiy % complete.

alignment.targetDescription: Institute of Coding recognition of self assessed knowledge

criteria.narrative: Participants must complete all the courses to be awarded with the digital badge.
